title: FS: Lot of 27 Low Grade T212 Obak

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 27 Low Grade T212 Obak
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T212 Obak cards available for sale. All of these cards are obviously low grade. Still, some are very difficult low population cards and tough to find in any condition.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

**ALL CARDS SOLD OR MOVED TO NEW LISTING**
Always fun looking at what you have to offer…
